bug.author: ReyRen
bug.summary: upstream connect error or disconnect/reset before headers. reset reason: connection failure
bug.description:
/kind bug What steps did you take and what happened: [A clear and concise description of what the bug is.] I following the doc installed the kubeflow, and all of those pods are at RUNNING status. But, when I create a Notebook Servers, which use a custome image, pods startup and keep RUNNING status. Then I try to click "connect" in Notebook Servers, the error would occur with upstream connect error or disconnect/reset before headers. reset reason: connection failure. And get 503 response. PS: I give sufficient resources (cpu:8, mem:20Gi) for this server. What did you expect to happen: I'm not pretty sure what's next when I click "connect", but not like this at least. Anything else you would like to add: [Miscellaneous information that will assist in solving the issue.] Environment:
Kubeflow version: (version number can be found at the bottom left corner of the Kubeflow dashboard): v1.0 kfctl version: (use kfctl version): kfctl v1.0.2-0-ga476281 Kubernetes platform: (e.g. minikube) not the minikube Kubernetes version: (use kubectl version): Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"18", GitVersion:"v1.18.2", GitCommit:"52c56ce7a8272c798dbc29846288d7cd9fbae032", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2020-04-16T11:56:40Z", GoVersion:"go1.13.9", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"} Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"18", GitVersion:"v1.18.2", GitCommit:"52c56ce7a8272c798dbc29846288d7cd9fbae032", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2020-04-16T11:48:36Z", GoVersion:"go1.13.9", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"} OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release): NAME="Ubuntu" VERSION="18.04.3 LTS (Bionic Beaver)" ID=ubuntu ID_LIKE=debian PRETTY_NAME="Ubuntu 18.04.3 LTS" VERSION_ID="18.04" HOME_URL="https://www.ubuntu.com/" SUPPORT_URL="https://help.ubuntu.com/" BUG_REPORT_URL="https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/" PRIVACY_POLICY_URL="https://www.ubuntu.com/legal/terms-and-policies/privacy-policy" VERSION_CODENAME=bionic UBUNTU_CODENAME=bionic
